problem_text: Find the area of the regular polygon.

Equals(MeasureOf(Angle(A, B, E)), MeasureOf(Angle(G, F, C)))
Equals(MeasureOf(Angle(E, G, F)), MeasureOf(Angle(C, A, B)))
Equals(MeasureOf(Angle(E, G, F)), MeasureOf(Angle(F, C, A)))
Equals(MeasureOf(Angle(E, G, F)), MeasureOf(Angle(G, F, C)))

Find(AreaOf(Regular(Heptagon(A, B, C, D, E, F, G))))
error: Error: premise nodes are not in the graph - [Predicate[Line(D, D)]] when connecting with theorem Area formula of Regular Heptagon(A, B, E, G, F, C, D) by formula 1: Heptagon(A, B, E, G, F, C, D) & Line(D, D) -> Equals(AreaOf(Regular(Heptagon(A, B, E, G, F, C, D))), Div(Mul(7.0, LengthOf(Line(C, D)), LengthOf(Line(D, D))), 2.0)) & Equals(AreaOf(Heptagon(A, B, E, G, F, C, D)), Div(Mul(7.0, LengthOf(Line(C, D)), LengthOf(Line(D, D))), 2.0))
